dv_short_description: Zelle / Application was unavailable due to an issue at EWS.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients were unable to access Zelle application due to an issue at the third party vendor - Early Warning Systems (EWS).

dv_short_description: Modern Banking Platform / Some clients experienced latency issues.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Modern Banking Platform experienced latency issues due to parameter change made by AMEX, which caused the application to perform in a degraded state.

u_applications_impacted:
BSG - Zelle, Bill Pay, BeB, Integrated Payable, Prepaid South, CaseVue, Horizon, Falcon - (missing in sending case detailed reports to internal FIS), Bankway
CM - Transfer Agency, GMI, IntelliMatch, InvestOne,  Protegent, Phase3, Fron Arena, WRA - Global Plus, SRW App, Investran, InTrader Portal, Ubix
dv_short_description: Email not delivered
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Email delivery was unavailable for some BSG and CM applications due to an email routing issue with vendor ProofPoint's IP database.

dv_short_description: Card Production Bastions Down - STX & STP Locations
u_summary_impact_root_summary: FIS Card Pro Support in Romeoville was unable to access some bastion servers due to firewall rules missing

dv_short_description: BSG/Early Warning EWFT / Unable to process files since moving to DR
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Early Warning made configuration changes to the 199.47.139.220 VPN connection, no FIS changes required.

dv_short_description: ImageCentre LR8 / Intermittent Connectivity Issues
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Intermittent access issue affecting ImageCentre due to an extraneous local listener port configured for the database in LR8.

dv_short_description: Deposit ACH Memopost jobs for IMSD / Twin H & R are not complete
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Teams continued to work on checking the older files which can be deleted to free up a size. The ticket was promoted to major as EIM was engaged for more than 15 minutes on the call.

dv_short_description: Elevated Response Times for HZNEP2 and HZNCP3 banks (HORIZON core)
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Horizon Core experienced elevated response times impacting a subset of clients. Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Horizon team did receive alerts before clients began to report slowness.

dv_short_description: Mobile for CeB clients experienced intermittent errors.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Mobile for CeB clients experienced intermittent errors. The root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Payments One / Transactions for Mercury Client Irving CU Posted to Another CU
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Irving CU transactions were incorrectly routed to Aegis CU due to Aegis configured to the wrong port.

dv_short_description: Data Navigator unavailable due to long running maintenance
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Data Navigator was unavailable for clients due to long running maintenance release.

dv_short_description: Norcross EFT / Mid Central Savings not connecting to BDOC Post DRE
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Norcross EFT / Mid Central Savings not connecting to BDOC Post DRE.  The root cause is still being investigated.

dv_short_description: Bankway/Autoloader appears to be malfunctioning
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There was an incident that impacted the Bankway Region Autoloader.    Status of file corrected to allow the ACH files to process.

dv_short_description: Client Portal / Clients were unable to access the application.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients were unable to access the Client Portal application due to the incorrect data for my.fisglobal.com that was included in the reverse proxy cleanup of old configurations.

dv_short_description: ImageCentre / LR10 Service Account Locked out
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients on LR10 was unable to access ImageCenter due to the affected server causing the service account to lockup. Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Alerts were generated from the Tryambak tool and were sent to the ImageCentre app support team.

dv_short_description: Ensenta clients reported they were unable to receive check images for ATM deposits.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Ensenta clients were unable to connect to FIS due to a connectivity issue with network switch configuration.  Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: IBS World Markets / The application was unavailable for single client TIAA Bank
u_summary_impact_root_summary: The IBS World Markets application is unavailable for TIAA Bank due to Hard Disk drives failures in the application array.
u_alert_to_who: The application support team has identified via OEM Alerts and Batch Scripts alerts that the IBS World Markets application is unable to connect to the database THPRD01 server.

dv_short_description: Global Protect / Some users were experiencing latency
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There was an issue in the US southeast for a locked-up gateway that caused some users latency. The southeast is where we have the most users.  The system auto-moved users to other gateways across the US, but those gateways had to auto-scale up to handle the load.   The latency was felt until everything scaled up.

dv_short_description: GETPAID / Some clients are not able to access the application
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Some clients were unable to access GetPaid. The root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: DigitalOne (Business, CIT, CAX, FHB), Open Payments Framework (OPF), Mobile Banking (MB1, MB2, MB5, MB6), Electronics Benefit Transfer (EBT) National Card Holder (NCH) and California Card Holder (CA CH) applications, Business eBanking (BeB), Enterprise Authentication Management (EAM)
dv_short_description: PHX Network / High response time and drop in traffic for a subset of applications
u_summary_impact_root_summary: High response time and drop in traffic for a subset of applications in the Phoenix Data Center due to load balancer HA (High Availability) switchover.
u_alert_to_who: NOC received the alert regarding the load balancer switchover. Application/Operations teams also received an alert via their monitoring tool.

u_applications_impacted:
Reported Impact is broken down based on business service:

BSG: Commercial Capture, Xpress Deposit, Consumer eBanking, Ezcard, EzBusiness, Ezcard Target, OPA, NCH, CA-CH, Rest API, Digital One Business, Digital One HWB, Digital One, Online Account Open,  Business eBanking, CIT, BOH, CAX, AAA, BMO, FHB, Flex, Mobile, Integrated Payables, Decision Solutions, Qualifile, IDV, IDA, OFAC, Code Connect. 

MS: triPOS cloud, Integrated Payments: Express, Integrated Payments MercuryPay, RAFT, Worldpay Dashboard, Storage Manager.
dv_short_description: Drop in Traffic Through Akamai / Impacted BSG and MS Apps
u_summary_impact_root_summary: The applications behind Akamai for Banking Solutions, Merchant Solutions and Capital Markets were impacted due to a drop in traffic observed across all data centres. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Get Paid  / FTP Permission issue on NA1 and NA2 PROD servers
u_summary_impact_root_summary: FTP Permission issue on GetPaid's NA1 and NA2 Production servers due to a locked Bitvise account.
u_alert_to_who: GetPaid team received multiple Splunk alerts.

dv_short_description: Norcross / Clients reporting transaction declines
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Norcross clients reported declines due to Advance Risk Blocking (ARB) rules.

dv_short_description: Horizon IVR / Some banks are not receiving calls.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: HORIZON IVR was down due to a lumen circuit issue in LRK (Tornado), Teams raised an ECR CH23001304303 to restore service.

dv_short_description: Single bank BankTennessee is not able to access ImageCentre and Horizon
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Single client, BankTennessee was not able to access Image Centre and Horizon due to the Lumen circuit issue.

dv_short_description: Power outages at the Norcross data center yesterday. Power is back up but nothing is online. Unable to connect to internet and all devices cant connect
u_summary_impact_root_summary: FIS Norcross production traffic was down due to the Little Rock Lumen circuit issue.

u_applications_impacted: Modern Banking Platform API OPF Amex CallsDigital One for Citizens Access (CAX) and Bank of Montreal (BMO)
dv_short_description: MBP Amex / Intermittent increased response times and API failures.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Modern Banking Platform (MBP) experienced increased response times and API failures for client AMEX.  Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Validation Engine failure for CIT - Failed
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There was an issue with an internal server causing intermittent failures for Digital Account Creation, Consumer eBanking (CeB), FIS external transfers and Digital One Account Open application due to a bad JVM on the Validation Engine application.
u_alert_to_who: The team did receive an alert for JVM threadpool max.  Need to investigate further what actions should have occurred at that time.

dv_short_description: GetPaid / Some single tenant clients reported  FTP slowness.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Single tenant clients experienced latency with SFTP transfers. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Bankway / Core is unavailable for 4 clients
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Adjacent banks in a region lost access to Bankway Core Banking system due to RiverWind Bank's migration process to Bankway Core Banking system.

dv_short_description: IVR / Cardholders unable to activate cards or change pin numbers across for some phone lines
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Cardholders were unable to activate cards or change PINs via Interactive Voice Response (IVR) due to an incorrect entry in the BIN transfer table.

u_applications_impacted: FIS eAccess, EBT Edge, Decision Solutions eAccess Portal, Decision Solutions Reports Portal, UserAdmin, DataNavigator  (P6 & P7 were impacted), mConsole (SecurLOCK Equip)-(Access was impacted however no impacts to card controls transaction processing/decisioning.)
dv_short_description: eAccess/UserAdmin Proxy errors affecting Single Sign-on
u_summary_impact_root_summary: eAccess/UserAdmin Proxy errors affecting Single Sign-on.  The root cause is still under investigation.

dv_short_description: Billpay and Zelle experienced response time spikes.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Billpay and Zelle experienced high response time spikes.  Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who:
14:23 CT - NOC: Load Balancer failover. 
14:26 CT - DIH: DB out of process memory error ORA-04030

dv_short_description: Ozona Bank was unable to connect to Mobile Banking application
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Ozona Bank was unable to connect to the Mobile Banking application. The client performed a change that caused FIS VCE onb-fislittlerock-520 to become inaccessible.  The ticket was promoted for ECR purposes, the device was rebooted mitigating the impact.

dv_short_description: Single client- Mitsubishi Union Bank connectivity issue.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Single client, Mitsubishi Union Bank experienced connectivity issue, due to a network shared file system server reboot.

dv_short_description: BillPay / Zelle / Response time spike affecting users
u_summary_impact_root_summary: An issue affected the availability and functionalities of BillPay and Zelle applications. The root cause is still under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Oracle DBA Support; Mobile Money Service Delivery

dv_short_description: Horizon XE / Deposits Origination unavailable for some clients
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Horizon XE some clients experienced deposit origination issues due to a connectivity issue with vendor CSI.

dv_short_description: ChexSystems / New User Registration Email Issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: The new consumer registration "Welcome" email was showing XML data tags with all the content entered by the user on the ChexSystems page due to a custom change made by Decision Solutions firm owner in the User Create Password Email template.

dv_short_description: Fidelity Bank / Customer-owned circuit in Little Rock went down.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Fidelity Bank was down due to a Lumen circuit issue in LRK (Tornado). Teams raised an ECR CH23001304640 to restore service.

dv_short_description: IST Switch / Chevron seeing timeouts
u_summary_impact_root_summary:
To stop the impact to business - traffic flow was put in Maintenance i.e. no transaction will flow through it 
All traffic was redirected to West regions
CHASE Formater restarted - which resulted in echo msgs to successfully come in - with success - traffic was redirected to be hot -hot - no issues receieved
u_alert_to_who: AU IST Paypal and Transaction processing team

dv_short_description: Automated consumer notifications card holder update issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Automated Consumer notification mailer insert error.  Support team determine issue was caused by human error while printing file.  Education and new process were put in place to prevent this issue in future.

dv_short_description: PH agents (both remote & office) are getting error when we access data navigator in EFUNDS
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Philippines and Brazil FIS staff reported that they were unable to access FIS eAccess site due to an error requesting a new IP for IdP.

dv_short_description: Issue: VDI (Storage Hardware) Issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Philippines Manila site was unable to connect to any applications on the network due to a scheduled Maintenance change.

dv_short_description: StarView - Client accessibility issues
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients were unable to access the StarView application due to parameters issue following a StarView mainframe upgrade.

dv_short_description: PaymentOne/Discover Financial  services, Failures for activation and Pin Change
u_summary_impact_root_summary: IN23010420597 - PaymentOne/ Failures for activation and Pin Change.  Mitigated issue by switching traffic from Phoenix to BDOC

dv_short_description: BDOC BCFS / Transactions are being declined for DebitCard
u_summary_impact_root_summary: BCFS transactions in BDOC not processing due to institutions being inadvertently deleted during a maintenance change.
u_alert_to_who: Please note we need to discuss monitoring further on the PIR to see if appropriate alerting is set up and triggered as expected.  It was mentioned there was some alerting but need to get a better understanding on the PIR.

dv_short_description: QualiFile/ChexSystems Discovery ERROR Due to Bad Traffic
u_summary_impact_root_summary: ASSOCIATED CREDIT UNION OF TEXAS was sending bad data into Qualifile causing mainframe resource shortages, They were suspended as a normal business practice until traffic quality can be adjusted

dv_short_description: Treasury Banking & Payments: Certegy Check Settlement files did not Process
u_summary_impact_root_summary:
Certegy settlement files for 12/30 thru 1/02 did not process, causing a 1-day delay to Merchant funds. 
The issue was resolved at 3:15 PM CT after a successful index rebuild and processing of settlement batch files.

u_applications_impacted:
SecureAccess and eZDisclosure 

TBS, BASE2000, EFT Services – Norcross, EFT Services - St. Pete, EFT Services - Brown Deer, EFT Services - New Berlin
dv_short_description: SecurLock Manager and eZDisclosure applications are unavailable
u_summary_impact_root_summary: SecurLOCK Manage and eZDisclosure were unavailable due to a security issue. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: DirectLink / AMX observing intermittent failures for Check Deposit
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Check Deposit functionality for Direct Link was intermittently unavailable for single client Amex. Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who:
Needs improvement client reported.

OOM (Out of Memory) Alerts 
SPLUNK - Application Team

dv_short_description: California Host systems unavailable.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: California Host system services for clients and cardholders were unavailable due to router hardware failure in BDOC.
u_alert_to_who: Should have been received to Global NOC support. A problem task will be opened to confirm.

dv_short_description: Horizon and Image center unreachable for a single client (Rollstone)
u_summary_impact_root_summary: SD WAN team performed fireware update via CH23000112999, which caused async routing due to a duplicate route.

dv_short_description: Online Banking New Account Application Errors
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Online Banking clients were unable to open new accounts. Root cause under investigation.

dv_short_description: Fraud Navigator / TD Bank instance has been experiencing transaction timeouts.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Fraud Navigator for TD Bank instance experienced transaction timeouts. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: ATMS unavailable / Bank of Labor multiple locations
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Bank of Labor (CSS Client) ATMs were unavailable due to a missing NAT configuration on Phoenix Router after a failover.  No client impact.

dv_short_description: eZCard / Intermittent API timeouts
u_summary_impact_root_summary: API calls timed out for clients on the eZCard application due to database blocking sessions. Root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: Real Time Payments (RTP), Modern Banking Platform (MBP), Business eBanking (BeB), Mobile, Digital One for First Hawaiian Bank
dv_short_description: Real-Time Payments / Intermittent transaction failures.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: First Hawaiian Bank experienced high response times when processing through applications connecting to Phoenix DC. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: CardPro Connect / Some clients reporting intermittent issue accessing the application
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Intermittent CardPro unavailability due to an improperly bound SSL on a certificate.

dv_short_description: Network latency in Little Rock impacting multiple applications
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Network issues impacted applications in the Little Rock data center. The root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Various application and network received alerts indicating an issue.

dv_short_description: Horizon Classic (GUI/CORE) users were unable to use Connections CRM (Connections.fisglobal.com).
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Horizon Classic (GUI/CORE) users were unable to use Connections CRM (Connections.fisglobal.com) after a security block was performed on FIS reverse proxies in LR, Horizon Classic users were unable to access, and use the Connections CRM (client relationship Management) product. Emergency firewall change (change ticket# CH23001226637) was implemented to allow for Horizon Classic (core) LPARs to reach the Internal VIP which is preferred and allowed to mitigate the issue.

u_applications_impacted: IDP Cloud 5, EBT Edge Web Application
dv_short_description: IDP and EBT / Active Remote Code Execution Threat on the IDP Cloud 5 environment.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Alerts received for an IDP and EBT / Active Remote Code Execution Threat on the IDP Cloud 5 environment. Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: IdP and EBT teams received alerts.

dv_short_description: Vicor RIDS production computers unavailable
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Vicor Receivables Information Delivery System (RIDS) production computers were unavailable due to a network issue.

dv_short_description: IVR / Cardholders unable to reset PIN when calling IVR
u_summary_impact_root_summary: 10 FIs were unable to set PINs for instant cards within the IVR in a timely manner due to a known AP-CIMS sync cycle timeframe.

dv_short_description: RTLP - Some clients unable to connect
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Real Time Lending was unavailable for clients due to an internal certificate change.

dv_short_description: Government Services - EBT (CA Cardholder Portal) / Host to Host slowness for single client CA
u_summary_impact_root_summary: BenefitCAL portal was unavailable for California EBT cardholders. The root cause is still under investigation.

dv_short_description: Government Services - EBT / WIC POS Devices were failing impacting transaction processing
u_summary_impact_root_summary: FIS-managed POS terminals unable to process EBT cardholder transactions due to high memory usage on server.

dv_short_description: 4 Clients were unable to connect to Real-Time Lending Platform application.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: 4 Clients were unable to connect to the Real-Time Lending Platform Banker side application after a vendor deployment was performed Sunday 1/22/23. Validations were performed and client testing was successful after Sunday's deployment. However, this morning 4 clients that did not validate had issues accessing the application. Support teams were engaged and redeployed missing parts of vendor deployment in order to mitigate the issue.

dv_short_description: COP -> CD Process are in hold.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: ConnectDirect transmissions from Profile to vendor, Early Warning Systems (EWS), failed due to a circuit issue on the vendor's network.
u_alert_to_who: Mainframe Support received an alert shortly after the first file failed.

dv_short_description: CardPro Connect / Application was throwing 502 errors impacting client access
u_summary_impact_root_summary: CardPro Connect application was inaccessible to internal and external users. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: IBS World Market / Batch processing was impacted due to hardware failure for client TIAA
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Batch processing for single client, TIAA Bank was delayed due to a hard disk failure on the server.
u_alert_to_who: Application team received a job failure error from Control-M tool.

dv_short_description: Cardholders in North and South Dakota were unable to activate cards and change PIN via EBT IVR
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Cardholders in North and South Dakota were unable to change/set a PIN via the EBT IVR due to a third-party change.

dv_short_description: BeB / Delay in ACH incoming and outgoing transmissions
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Client files were delayed due to an issue affecting (ACH) Automated Clearing House files and IBS (Integrated Business Services) transmissions. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Mercury Core /  ESXi server not responding
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Windows team reported that  ESXi server was having a hardware error. The Network team removed the NIC from LACP to standard VLAN to resolve the issue.

dv_short_description: TRIPS  / Unable to process returned items due to expired password.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Users were unable to access TRIPS Incoming Returns to process real-type account lookups and holds due to an expired Connectware password.

dv_short_description: BSG / Daily jobs in hung state on TEL1 - OMVS consuming more CPU
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Jobs abended, traffic switched away.   IPL server restarted and traffic switched back.  Validations complete and all three merchants and schemes validated. Jobs running as BAU.

dv_short_description: RAFT and Mobile Banking DNS Issue Observed
u_summary_impact_root_summary: A subset of Raft API and Mobile Banking's MB5 traffic experienced DNS failures due to an issue within  F5 Silverline's MGMT network that impacted their mitigation appliance.
u_alert_to_who:
Thousand Eyes alerts for WS.Vantiv.COM were observed
Unsure if Silverline had alerts

dv_short_description: Some CM and BSG applications were inaccessible
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Application support teams reported Quantum, eBAM and GetPaid applications inaccessible for some Capital Markets and Banking Solution clients.  Root cause under investigation.

dv_short_description: Nice Incontact phone system - Call center agents unable to transfer escalation calls
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Nice Incontact phone system - Call center agents unable to transfer escalation calls. This was identified to be vendor caused.

dv_short_description: First Hawaiian Bank / TSYS transactions were failing through BCFS switch
u_summary_impact_root_summary: First Hawaiian Bank TSYS transactions processing through the BCFS switch were failing due to a CMS database change.
u_alert_to_who: ProcOps gets these alerts from Alert Center.

dv_short_description: NICE Incontact / Intermittent Call Drops for 3 Banking Solutions Call Centers
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Nice Incontact telephony services were intermittently crashing during calls with clients. The root cause is being investigated.

dv_short_description: Intermittent Connection Issue with FIS
u_summary_impact_root_summary: East West Bank is experiencing intermittent timeouts with a status code error from FIS on profile end points. Root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: FIS Mobile Banking Services-FMMB, FIS Xpress Deposit-FXD, Real Time Data Exchange (BASE), Commercial Capture Xpress-CCX, Valutec-VTEC, Mercury Core System-Merc, Internet Banking - FIS Online Banking-OLB
dv_short_description: Storage issue in Little Rock DC
u_summary_impact_root_summary: A subset of hosted BSG and MS applications in Little Rock DC experienced availability issues due to DELL storage issue. Root cause is still being investigated.
u_alert_to_who: Alert directly from the controller; David Garner got an email

dv_short_description: EFT Web Admin/ Intercept - Functionality not working.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Some functionalities for the EFT Web Admin (Intercept) tool were impacted due to a corrupted STRATUS queue.

u_applications_impacted: Integrated Payment - Express and MercuryPay,  Valutec Direct - Valutec IP Transaction Processing, Valutec Dial, Valutec Web Services, ToastAPI
dv_short_description: Mercury and Express/ Valutec-Direct dependent transactions were failing.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Integrated Payment platforms had transactional impact due to a long running SQL query.
u_alert_to_who: Valutec was getting a Tryambak alert which cleared in 3-minutes however the issue persisted.

dv_short_description: 1st State Bank Connectivity Issues | Facing difficulty with tunnel connection to FIS and Unmanaged VPN Tunnel is Hard Down due to ISP Address Change.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: 1st State Bank made changes to their IPs which caused Base2000 and IPSwitch to go down. We changed the IP address to match their connections @9:55EST via CH23001287991.  Resolved @9:55EST
u_alert_to_who: Global NOC Client via email from 1st State Bank

dv_short_description: Horizon XE Banks Down
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Horizon XE application was unavailable for five clients due to additional impact from Zero Day Vulnerability maintenance.
u_alert_to_who: Alerts were received by application support and the client also reported the issue.

dv_short_description: Unable to use Device Contacts
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Unable to use Device Contacts after db failover.

dv_short_description: Mercury on Demand / 2 Clients Reported Connectivity Issues
u_summary_impact_root_summary: 2 Mercury on Demand Clients were unable to connect to FIS.  This was due to hung IP Sec Tunnels for each client.

dv_short_description: Base2000 / Duplicate Payment Posting from 11/2022 on 03/13/2023 for Multiple FIs
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Base2000 clients experienced duplicated payments due to a payment file being reprocessed.

u_applications_impacted:
Decision Solutions Chex Advisor - No transactions observed between 21:15 - 21:29 CT
D1 Flex - Experienced high response time
Payments One - CC exceptions during the same timeframe.

dv_short_description: Third-Party vendor 'Progress' reported a vulnerabilty with the MOVEit Transfer application
u_summary_impact_root_summary: At 11:30 am CT, we started seeing external traffic from SSH (primary method) against the new patch level 22.1.8. Teams remediated the web interface issue as of 12:39 pm CT with restarting the IIS. The remainder of the Production farm was upgraded 12:20 - 12:56 pm CT. DR (LRK)  is being started with the upgrade. Bottom line, ALL patching applied to v2022.1.8 in Prod (2 servers), DR (2 servers), and UAT (1 server).  The team resolved the SSH issue in DR (LRK) as if 5:21 PM CT.

dv_short_description: NYCE - AMEX transactions were declining
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There was an issue that caused approximately 30K declines for American Express due to CH24001529268. Teams performed a fix forward to resolve the issue. A problem ticket will be opened to track the issue.

dv_short_description: FIS Chip Card Plug-In (CCPI) - Experiencing high instances of latency
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients were unable to create EMV chip cards due to extreme latency using the FIS Chip Card Plugin. A problematic SQL stored procedure was masked from use and the EMV service was restarted to resolve the issue. Microsoft SQL case has been opened for further investigation.

dv_short_description: Horizon / Nacha ACH Return files were generated in the incorrect format
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Nacha Automated Clearing House (ACH) return files were generated with an incorrect format for Horizon clients housed in EP4 logical partition (LPAR). Seven clients (Bank of Bennington, Old Dominion Bank, Lifestore Bank, Citizen's Bank, TC Federal, First Bank, Douglas National Bank) were affected. The impact is limited to a delay in returns processing for clients. The code tested successfully in QA and was applied to Production on 10-Mar-2024.  Root cause remains under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Horizon - "Will be rejected by the FED" when attempting to process the ACH files.

u_summary_impact_root_summary: Commercial Capture Xpress (CCX) Clients reported SSO issues accessing due to a blocked IP caused by an Akamai change.

u_applications_impacted: Image applications, ImageCentre, VisionIP, Oasis, SAND, TRIPS, VisionRemit, FIS Securities Finance Trading and Collateral Platform (Apex Collateral), NAL internet direct, IBS ME jobs, FIS DirectLink, Real Time Lending Platform, Transfer Agency, login OTP, InvestOne, ACHPS, ACH Tracker, EFT Norcross, FIS Integrated Payables, Default Manager.
dv_short_description: Email service experiencing intermittent failures sending messages
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Internal email services and OTP experienced intermittently messages to fail.  Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Found increasing volume through alerting and the client also reported of issue.

u_applications_impacted: P1C, Service View Plus (SV+) and P1C specific API calls for RTDX/Code connect.
dv_short_description: Authorization and API calls failures on P1C Mainframe
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Payments One Credit (P1C)-P1C clients were unable to process card transactions and other related services due to an issue with the APIR Authorization in core parameter load.

dv_short_description: Omni Workflow / Voorhees Gen3 servers not resolving host names
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Omni Servers were unable to resolve host names due to a change script exceeding the Hostname to IP upload amount.

dv_short_description: BASE2000/ Duplicate Returned Payment file posted
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Team will reverse the duplicates, and take corrective action

dv_short_description: PayByPhone / Slow response from PayNet impacting Daily batch file processing
u_summary_impact_root_summary: PayNet processing latency due to the sequence number for Consumer exceeding the value Java would accept preventing creation of required consumer record. A fix was applied to address the sequence number issue. There will be settlement delays for PayNet clients' and PayByPhone payments for card holders. Approximately 8252 transactions for a total of $2.4M USD were affected.  The remaining unsettled transactions will be processed as part of the 18:00 CT file. Root cause is under investigation and will be tracked via problem ticket.

u_applications_impacted: Base2000, EZBusiness, Navigator, Mobile 5.0 - Midfirst Bank
dv_short_description: Base2000 region Latency / Region failures.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Little Rock CICS regions 2 and 3 were unavailable causing timeouts and connectivity errors for Base2000, EZBusiness, Navigator, and Mobile 5.0 (only for MidFirst Bank). Teams moved traffic from Little Rock to BDOC to mitigate impact. VISA identified a code error on their end, a flag that should have been turned off to prevent the flood of transactions from being sent to FIS. VISA is working on a fix.
u_alert_to_who: Alerts received by Environment support team.

dv_short_description: Multiple Dynatrace alerts for CIT,RNST & BMO
u_summary_impact_root_summary: External issue

dv_short_description: USAA / Code Connect Exceptions in Payments One
u_summary_impact_root_summary: USAA Go-live - Clients (USAA, AMEX, H&R Block) experienced code connection exceptions within the Payments One application causing an inability to search debit cards and service clients. Increasing TCP paths/ports/servers on the Connex side for USAA mitigated the impact. Confirmed no further errors have been observed since 19:29 CT. Teams monitoring peak volumes today and looks good as of 08:30 CT.

dv_short_description: PaymentOne debit card creation issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Payments One did not receive card data on new card creation causing cardholders to experience failures when using their new cards. Support manually failed over traffic from the W7 node to the A7 node to resolve the issue. A problem ticket has been created to track this issue.

dv_short_description: eDelivery - Clients unable to access site on LR1
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients were receiving an error when attempting to access eDelivery via Single Sign On (SSO). Affected clients were unable to access eDelivery via SSO. An ECR (CH24001552867) to change the persistence type from COOKIEINSERT to SOURCEIP was completed at 12:03 CT to remediate the issue.  Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Profile / Link timeouts
u_summary_impact_root_summary: ProcOps had alerts post Circuit flapping between BDOC and PHX2.   CAP1 also seen an increase of MasterCard standins (3,623) between 12:45 - 14:00 CT.  All alerts resolved without intervention.

dv_short_description: OLB- Wire- Wires were stuck in processing status
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Digital One Flex-D1Flex, eWire processing was delayed for clients due to a Middleware certificate issue.

dv_short_description: CaseVue / Unable to login to Infinity Scan.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: CaseVue users are unable to access Infinity Scan due to IDP 5/5 release..

dv_short_description: Horizon XE / clients experiencing latency
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Horizon XE Clients experienced latency while using  the application.  Root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: EBTEdge, OnePageApp, National Cardholder Portal, IVR Personilization and EBT IVR.
dv_short_description: EBTEdge 502 Proxy Error
u_summary_impact_root_summary: EBT applications were unavailable and experienced limited functionality due to database scan listener issue.
u_alert_to_who: There is a delay in email notification for OEM monitoring alerts.  We are opening a problem task to follow up on that.

dv_short_description: eWire clients reporting screen latency
u_summary_impact_root_summary: eWire clients experienced application related degradation issues. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: PaymentsOne - Clients are unable to change PIN
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Incident affecting the PIN change functionality for clients on the PaymentsOne platform. The root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Multiple banks reporting Latency/sporadic timeout.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: The issue of intermittent duplicate check deposits was resolved by the FIS team via rerouting traffic to a different tunnel.

dv_short_description: IBS Deposit / Control-M jobs did not load for 11/09 - 11/10
u_summary_impact_root_summary:
FIS technical teams were able to diagnose and correct the issue. We will live post any missed transaction on Saturday, Nov. 11, 2023, with the effective date of November 10.
The missed transaction will be reflected in the accounts balance on Saturday, November 11, and will be included with the Monday, November 13 posting.
This delay may have impacted OFAC IAT Decisioning, Exception Processing, General Ledger, PeopleSoft, and Deposit Statements.
u_alert_to_who: Alerts were received by IBS service delivery team – after the command center alerted them.

dv_short_description: Two clients reporting ATM monitoring Vision 4 logging issues.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Two clients, BMO and Comerica, have reported that the automatic logging feature in Vision 4 is experiencing failures due to an external change.

dv_short_description: CardPro Connect / Clients unable to access the application.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Subset of clients are unable to access CardPro Connect. Root cause under investigation.

dv_short_description: RTDX/Users are unable to access the DRC (Dispute Resolution Center) application.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: RTDX/Users are unable to access the DRC (Dispute Resolution Center) application. The issue was identified in the proactive bridge call for the wild card certificates. The issue was mitigated prior to the market opening followed by a change ticket CH23001393637.

dv_short_description: Internal users reporting unable to access one Microsoft Auth'd tenant
u_summary_impact_root_summary: ECR was created to add group to Workday_Prisma_NextGen_Banking_Admin_Ops_Exec_Admin to access myworkspace.troweprice.com

dv_short_description: PHX / Intermittent timeouts observed.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: EIM was engaged regarding an intermittent issue in PHX Datacenter, as per NOC this is a repeat issue of the  PHX2 switch CAS3. Teams together with CISCO continue to investigate.

dv_short_description: Horizon XE / Atlantic Union Bank unable to access
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Atlantic Union Bank could not access Horizon XE due to an invalid password issue.
u_alert_to_who: The Horizon support team indicated they got alert at 06:00 CT from an application tool that they use.

dv_short_description: Client called in repositing issues with all applications.  |  Community Trust Bank , INC  EID 11764
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Community Trust Bank was unable to connect to FIS due to an issue with their unmanaged AT&T network device.

dv_short_description: hFIS/BSGHorizon-PC- Location Unable to Communicate with FIS
u_summary_impact_root_summary:
Issue recovered on it's own - no action taken - 
It was confirmed there were no changes at merchant's end 
FIS checked the logs and confirmed that the transactions are not even hitting FIS Firewall

dv_short_description: CeB / eManager administrative tool is not accessible for CeB Banks
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Consumer eBanking (CeB) clients were unable to access the eManager application due to an expired certificate.

dv_short_description: Mobile CeB & BeB / Intermittent Login failure Alerts
u_summary_impact_root_summary: CeB and BeB clients intermittently lost connectivity to mobile devices.  CeB EAM adapter auto recycled to mitigate issue.
u_alert_to_who: Splunk alert went to eBanking Service Delivery

dv_short_description: APB4 file structure changes causing buffer/memory issues for DRNET
u_summary_impact_root_summary: DRNET replication was not working between W7 and A7 node for APCRDHLD files due to a planned release.

dv_short_description: eWire / Hung threads cause intermittent locked transactions for some clients
u_summary_impact_root_summary: eWire clients experienced application related degradation issues. Root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: Control-M: DQ -  Cash Manager, Trust Desk.
dv_short_description: IOA Calendars incorrectly listing 30-Nov as a holiday affecting ACH Control-M jobs
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Control-M ACH production batch flows delayed due to a holiday calendar entry error.

dv_short_description: Zelle / Intermittent failures for Add Payment calls.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients experienced intermittent failures with Zelle Add Payment calls due to a firewall issue at vendor, EWS (Early Warning System).

dv_short_description: MobiMoney - Application unavailable
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Packet loss between the Florence 1 servers to the T2 ASM F5 F5FLOKYDLT2ASM02, due to which the MobiMoney services could not restart.

dv_short_description: D1 Vulnerability  - Proactive Actions
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Zero-day vulnerability detected via bug bounty for Digital1 that allowed false bank account creations. There is no client impact. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: IST/ Single Region isolation impacting Chevron
u_summary_impact_root_summary: CVRN started to send Traffic over un-approved IPs 40.83.214.255, 40.83.209.95. After they stopped sending it over those IPs it resolved

dv_short_description: IST/Multiple Port Disconnections / Timeouts / CVRN
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Unknown Network Blip causing connection issues, Platform confirmed stable. Investigation continues

dv_short_description: Payments One Credit (P1C) - Reports unavailable to clients
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Payments One Credit (P1C) Header on P1C reports was moved causing report unavailability. Clients were unable to receive the Payments One Credit (P1C) reports for internal operations. There was no financial impact. The root cause was due to a P1C Release April 2024 change. Teams are working to run the jobs from Sunday to Monday. The change was reverted to resolve the issue. A problem ticket is being opened to track root cause analysis.

dv_short_description: IST Switch / Socket connection issues in chevron West Prod
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Chevron West region experienced socket errors. Team failed over to East region and ran a DNS clearing script. Palo Alto is working on identifying the underlying issue under case# 03030064 as this is the 2nd occurrence in 12 hours.

u_applications_impacted:
BSG Impact:

EBT Impact (NonFinancial): National Cardholder Portal, Cardholder REST API, GovPortal, OnePageApp, WebServices, EBT Financial

Debit Norcross Impact (running production in Chandler) multiple client host connections lost as well as connections to Falcon.  Norcross IVR briefly (would have impacted in flight card activations and pin changes.

MS Impact:

FPC card in CH101 took a hit

Nice, ApplePay Cash - 20k transactions
dv_short_description: Chandler Router / Multiple apps encountered a brief outage
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Multiple applications had a brief disconnect to the Router in Chandler.  Router re-established the connection automatically to mitigate the issue.

dv_short_description: Mastercard clearing files delayed resulting in a funding delay to financial institutions - externally caused
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Mastercard clearing files delayed causing a funding delay to financial institutions due to a global internal issue at Mastercard.

dv_short_description: Issue with BASE Lockbox file
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Base2000 Lockbox files were rejected for 16-Oct due to a bad record within the affected file.

dv_short_description: ServiceNow - Knowledge Base articles vulnerability issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: ServiceNow Knowledge Base articles vulnerability issue. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: TrustDesk / Trust accounts are not displaying in CeB
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Single client, FineMark National Bank & Trust was unable to view their trust accounts within the TrustDesk application. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: BDOC MoveIT / Impacted the batch processing of some applications
u_summary_impact_root_summary: The issue with BDOC MoveIT, impacted the batch processing of some applications.

u_applications_impacted: CMSe/Card Service Management, EFT Brown Deer Debit and Prepaid North.
dv_short_description: CMSe / Card service management web application issue.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Card status functionality was degraded within the CMSe application. Clients we unable to change card status or activate cards. Teams fixed an error in a software upgrade change to restore service.

u_applications_impacted:
CM – Integrity, Quantum, Trax, Sierra, Integrity SAAS, IntelliMatch, Amex Global Pay
Banking - GetPaid
dv_short_description: GetPaid and other Applications hosted in Philadelphia experienced connectivity or slowness issues.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: GETPAID, IntelliMatch, Trax, Integrity, and other applications hosted in the Philadelphia data center experienced latency and connectivity issues. Clients may have been unable to access the affected applications. Applications recovered following a firewall failover. Subsequently, Security Firewall team performed a failover and rebooted the primary and secondary firewalls overnight. Root cause under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: The NOC indicated the only alert they received out of Philadelphia was for a device AVGDCRLvPXvP02.  Need to understand if we should have received any alerts on firewall device phlsun9f5.

dv_short_description: WealthStation Trading & Phase3 - one-time-pin requests failing via SMS
u_summary_impact_root_summary: An external vendor issue intermittently caused users to not receive SMS one-time-pin requests for Phase3 and WealthStation Trading. One-time-pin requests for Phase3 and WealthStation Trading were intermittently failing for Hilltop Securities. As a workaround the client temporarily disabled OTP requests. Root cause is attributed to an external issue with vendor, Twilio.
u_alert_to_who: IdP team was able to see errors in their logs related to this issue.

dv_short_description: Prepaid South / FalconTCP Client Read Timed Out Errors.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Falcon was not receiving Prepaid South Real-Time transactions for fraud detection; they were going to Offline.  The root cause is attributed to the Unix Production Patching - OS (CH24001516469) that could have affected the certificate on PDCBASLFEPAP01 and PDCBASLFEPAP02 servers. To mitigate the impact, the certificate was reloaded on the servers at 00:38 CDT and the Real-Time transactions were seen getting to Falcon.

dv_short_description: Payments One Credit/ Posting errors on IVR payments for 11-Apr-2024
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients experienced a posting delay for transactions occurring on the PC1 IVR. A job name on the Data Placement Manager (DPR) was changed which caused an error and ~5700 transactions were impacted.  DPR team re-transmitted the missed files successfully to Mainframe and payments have been applied successfully to cardholders. Team reset the configuration settings for a permanent fix to avoid future occurrence.

dv_short_description: IST/ Chevron BIN route down, see rc08 over threshold.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: we saw route flap for route 206.253.184.0/24  was only up for 1 hour and 25 mins.

dv_short_description: Falcon CAMS message delays for Cardbase clients
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Falcon CAMS message delays for Cardbase clients. Clients may have been unable to access Falcon application to perform BAU activities. Multiple actions were taken including restarts, application configuration changes, and workload adjustments on the IST server to address the issue. There were observations around CPU usage by a specific application process (CMMT) which the team is investigating further. CAMS processing was isolated to IST node1 earlier in the afternoon as the high CPU condition was causing a spike in transaction timeouts. CAMS will continue to run on IST node1 separate from the auth processing to make sure there are no further impacts. Backlogs were caught up as of 21:37 CT.
u_alert_to_who: Fraud Support received alerts for spike in transaction timeouts.

dv_short_description: ACH uploaded file stuck
u_summary_impact_root_summary: ACH batch files were not detected in the designated BUPRD10 table due to memory issues. Batch services were restarted on all servers to prevent further memory issues, which were completed as of 13:19 CT. Following this, processing was caught back up. All remaining ACH files that were queued were successfully processed in the 13:45 CT run. 59 files for 20 banks will need to be resubmitted by the banks and will be handled as part of BAU operations. There were no misses in ACH cutoffs and no missed SLAs.

dv_short_description: Fedline Command (ACH) files were delayed in being received by FIS
u_summary_impact_root_summary: FIS did not receive daily ACH inbound files from the Federal Reserve (Fed). Investigations determined that an issue on the Fed's side caused the delay. The Fed implemented an emergency change to mitigate the issue. The files were then received and processed. A problem ticket will be opened to track the full impact and root cause.

dv_short_description: Infomatica/Unable to connect to Snowflake
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Infomatica was unable to connect to Snowflake. This prevented clients from being able to view up to date reporting. Investigations found a communication issue between AWS and EKS cluster. A change was made to Snowflake to whitelist an IP range, which resolved the problem. Full root cause is still being investigated.
u_alert_to_who: Jobs failed for credit Datawarehouse - Eys on Glass - CIO Banking Platform Team.

dv_short_description: Data Placement Manager / Intermittent SFTP Connection Failures
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients are experiencing a 500 error message when attempting to download time sensitive files on SFT instances of Data Placement Manager.  A workaround was put in place by restarting all service for the SFT instances of Data Placement Manager. Following these actions, clients reported receiving files. An ECR (CH24001602690) will be implemented overnight to upgrade to the most recent build fix. Root cause is under investigation.  The code provided by vendor Data 443 to FIS had issues, there is no test environment.
u_alert_to_who: Daily OEB June 5th David A Williams: This was identified through monitoring on the application, that is looking at the application. The SFT SecureFile team was monitoring after the Sunday upgrade and identified the issue. 06/03/2024 02:07 ET..

dv_short_description: Issue with  FIS DirectLink Risk Review
u_summary_impact_root_summary: FIS DirectLink Risk Review experienced an issue which caused user's review items to be unavailable. Support partially rolled back a change to mitigate impact. The root cause was related to CH24001601229.

dv_short_description: Horizon - PaymentsOne / Clients POS transactions have not been posted to core
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Horizon clients were unable to post POS transactions due to remediation steps taken for a separate issue on 10/4.

dv_short_description: Code connect exceptions on P1C
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Code Connect exceptions on P1C mainframe due to client performing stress tests.
u_alert_to_who: Teams monitoring the environment saw a drop in OMF traffic at 13:04 CT.  Monitoring indicated traffic for One Main Financial dropped, as well as reports of issues with ServiceView Plus. The CICS team advised that region CEPCP001 on the P1C mainframe was down. Support teams started killing tasks in an attempt to mitigate the impact.   Emerald Financial Services (Formerly HRB), was found to be performing stress tests on P1C. Emerald Financial Services were contacted and the stress testing was stopped. This and the tasks that were killed mitigated the impact on P1C, and as of 13:32 CT the issue was resolved.

dv_short_description: GetPaid - Clients unable to release live approvals
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There is an issue causing clients to be unable to release live credit approvals through the GetPaid application. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Bin 408869 at 100% denial.  Looping transaction
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Update authblk to stop looping for bin 408896 due to a transaction looping within three platforms

u_applications_impacted:
BSG - IBS Homepage, BancPac, AddVantage, D1, Mobile, MBP, Code Connect, ImageCentre, TRIPS, Decision Solutions, eAM, EBT, CeB, RTLP
CM - Apex Collateral, Gen3 Insurance (EAS), ETD (FIS Reconciliation Manager), TDMS, Astec for Securities Finance, VPM, Ubix, Investors View
dv_short_description: Banking Solutions and Capital Market applications inaccessible to clients
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Banking Solutions and Capital Market applications were inaccessible to clients due to a DNS issue.

dv_short_description: Users unable to load transaction history on the Mobile Application following change.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Following completion of CH24001559761 over the weekend to migrate CeB/IDS database to another exadata frame. The mobile database connections into account history for the FLEX migrated mobile 5.0 users were not updated with the change resulting in the account activity completing without the necessary data. To resolve, the database connection strings were updated in mobile to point to the new location.

dv_short_description: Mercury On Demand / clients unable to access core processing
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Thirteen clients reported unable to access Mercury On Demand, and Shelby Maughan could not connect to the server. Windows Virtual Cloud Support confirmed the server had been turned off, likely due to human error.

dv_short_description: Lockbox / SLA's at risk due to power outage
u_summary_impact_root_summary: The Lockbox application was down for clients due to a localized power outage. Lockbox users were unable to process payments due to unavailability. A generator was installed to restore service.

dv_short_description: Chevron |  Slow Network / DNS in West Azure Region
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Chevron West Region US was experiencing DNS latency or timeouts.  Support was able to fail over to East Region US without customer impact.  Support tested the West Region and latency was mitigated without intervention.  Palo Alto is investigating root cause.

dv_short_description: DirectLink Risk Review/Server is down and feature is not accessible
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Orbograph GPU server (LRK1WFIPORBAP09) was down (unreliable hardware) , brought it back up

dv_short_description: GETPAID - Clients experienced slowness within the application
u_summary_impact_root_summary: An issue caused clients to experience latency in the GETPAID application. The root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: Open Payments Framework (OPF), Modern Banking Platform (MBP),  Discovery, Decision solutions, Mobile, Loyalty (RN), MFB, CAX, BOH, FHB, OFG, Ameris, D1BIZ, IBS-FRC SD Windows, EBT, MoveIT, Fraud Chex, Cloud1 IDP
dv_short_description: Digital One / Spike and failures in overall Mobile
u_summary_impact_root_summary: A subset of Consumer eBanking (CeB), Business eBanking (BeB), CEB-CCB and OLB banks failed on Mobile due to a configuration change.
u_alert_to_who: D1 App Support teams received spike and failures for D1 apps.

u_applications_impacted: No applications were reported as impacted.
dv_short_description: DDoS activity impacting Datacenter
u_summary_impact_root_summary: An emergency change (CH23001471899) was implemented this morning to block DDoS traffic to the Phoenix and Brown Deer Data Centers.
u_alert_to_who: Kevin Siira was able to provide the timings of the issue based on what he was seeing from his tools.

dv_short_description: WebLink / OTP field on application is not showing
u_summary_impact_root_summary: It was a false positive when users were not getting the OTP field when logging in to WebLink application due to the Hybrid ThreatMetrix Footprint Provider rollout.

dv_short_description: PaymentsOne - Debit reset Pin errors received for MCDP clients only.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Debit card PIN resets were intermittently failing for PaymentsOne clients. Investigations identified a parameter change on the concerned server as the cause of this issue. Support team updated the parameter on affected server to restore services.

dv_short_description: IST Switch / Chevron / BIN route down due to BGP circuit issue in LTRC
u_summary_impact_root_summary: A BGP flap caused affected transaction processing on the IST platform for Chevron and Intuit
u_alert_to_who:
NOC - 
svc-NAS@wee04-lrd02ma-arus-re0> show interfaces xe-0/0/0 | match "Phys|Last"
Physical interface: xe-0/0/0, Enabled, Physical link is Down
Last flapped : 2024-06-13 20:10:50 CDT (00:35:41 ago)

dv_short_description: Customer not able to connect to CardPro Connect using stateless SSO.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: CardPro Connect experienced Single Sign On authentication errors. Call centre teams were impacted preventing access to the application and service customers with card related services. A duplicate key was identified impacting the validation and was removed to resolve the issue. Detailed root cause will be investigated via problem ticket.

dv_short_description: OLB Digital One Flex  / Clients getting 500 error due to server space
u_summary_impact_root_summary: OLB Digital One Flex experienced errors due to newly installed servers to support End-Of-Life Gen 1–Gen  3 were not handling traffic. Affected clients were experiencing latency and 500 errors. Investigations determined the servers required additional capacity to function correctly. Teams added capacity to the affected servers to restore service.  Root cause was attributed to the newly installed servers not having adequate capacity to support Digital One application functionality.

dv_short_description: PaymentsOne - Delay in daily reports getting loaded in PaymentOne
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Delay in loading of daily reports, Manufacturer order audit and the forecast, to PaymentOne potentially impacting manufacturing of expired cards. Clients were supposed to get the files by 7 AM CT, however, the files were received by 11 AM CT. Teams have concluded that the delay happened due to the month reports being loaded at the same time, which is a expected behavior during the beginning of every month. Teams will communicate to the clients that the issue will be looked into only if they dont receive the files by noon in future.

dv_short_description: PaymentsOne / Clients are unable to view transactions in User Interface (UI)
u_summary_impact_root_summary: PaymentsOne UI MCDP switch clients experienced errors  when attempting to view transactions.

dv_short_description: CardPro Connect / Admin Guide files for CPC became available to clients via internet.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: The Admin Guide Files for CardPro Connect application became available to clients via internet. The root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: CardPro Connect Application and Operations team.

dv_short_description: Consumer eBanking - Mobile, Business eBanking  - Login and real-time transaction failures
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Consumer eBanking application via mobile was unavailable for real-time transactions and balance inquiries due to a change that disabled the bank IDs.
u_alert_to_who: The application team received a Splunk alert.

dv_short_description: OPF US ACH / Single client Amerant Bank IBS duplicate file issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Duplicate OPF (Open Payments Framework) US ACH file for Amerant Bank due to a timeout on the MOVEit server.

u_applications_impacted: Infinity Connect calls connecting to RTDX, Base2000, TBS
dv_short_description: Credit Apps (BASE2000, TBS Stpte, TBS Madison) / API calls were failing due to Code Connect password expiration
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Base2000, TBS API's are failing due to CODEUD1 process ID got expired.
u_alert_to_who: The environmental support team received a Spectrum alert.

dv_short_description: CardPro/ Cards not in card pro 1 day delay on card orders to vendors
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Update for new client conversion caused a processing issue, delaying Arrow Financial's card order by 1 day

dv_short_description: Axos Clients in Paraguay and Venezuela Blocked - #18.x Venezuela Geo block
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Users from Paraguay and Venezuela were unable to access the new url for Akamai WAF (axosclearing.fisglobal.com). 100 + clients from Venezuela and Brazil were unable to view their accounts during Axos's migration from legacy Voorhees to Gen3 BDOC. The cause was identified as the Traffic originating from Venezuela being blocked by default, by FIS/Akamai. An ECR CH24001590362 was raised to resolve the issue.

dv_short_description: Aptra Vision 4 / BMO and CoAmerica unable to access UI
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Post firewall migration performed by the vendor NCR, Clients BMO and Comerica were not able to access UI from IDP landing page which is used to monitor their ATMs. Through the migration a security group which allow access to the UI was not ported over to the TA environment.  Vendor have readded the security group to all users to fix the issue. Subsequently,  teams have also removed invalid ATM institutional IDs for all clients (details are attached). End of impact declared at 11:21 CT

u_applications_impacted:
Capital Markets: Integrity – SaaS, Quantum, Trax, EBAM

Banking Solutions: GetPaid
dv_short_description: Philly Data Center Applications Intermittently unavailable.
dv_company: Sport Maska Inc. d/b/a CCM Hockey
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Philadelphia Data Center hosted applications experienced intermittent connectivity due to an external issue with Unitas Global.

dv_short_description: St. Pete Pass Through Debit/Job (PM222112) abend on TEL1 for Wells Fargo
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Pass Through-Debit application caused a one day delay to ACH posting. The root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Job abend failure received by the Operations team.

dv_short_description: Wealthware,Systematics / Users are unable to access the applications
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients unable to connect to Wealthware and Systematics applications in Little Rock Data Center. Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: The Spectrum alert went to the Network Team.

dv_short_description: IST/ Chevron Prod US EAST : Consecutive denied request - Timeouts / Reversals
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Issue affecting transaction processing on the IST platform for Chevron due to FIS Cloud Services (FCS - Public Cloud) Panorama Plugin Upgrade.

dv_short_description: Clients were unable to pull statements in eDelivery.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients experienced slowness and timeouts when attempting to pull statements in eDelivery. The root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: Falcon Expert Issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: TBD

u_applications_impacted: Horizon (XE and Classic), CeB, BeB, Mobile, D1 Flex
dv_short_description: Clients unable to access  Horizon (XE and Classic), CeB, BeB, Mobile, and D1 Flex applications.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Clients on the Horizon core were unable to access Horizon (XE and Classic), CeB, BeB, Mobile, and D1 Flex applications due to control block caching for TCP sockets disabled on HZNCP1.
u_alert_to_who: All Digital support teams and Horizon Core

u_applications_impacted: Horizon, Consumer eBanking, Mobile Banking, Flex, eWire, EFT, ImageCentre, Business eBanking, Horizon XE, FLO (FIS Loan Organization).
dv_short_description: Mobile Banking / Unavailable for Flex/OLB banks
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Banks experienced latency with the Horizon, Mobile Banking, Flex and Consumer eBanking applications. Clients reported errors during login attempts  to the applications. A recycle of applications (IPL) was performed to restore services. Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Support team observed alerts for Microsoft IIS that the number of current connections is high.

dv_short_description: hFIS/BSG-Chevron - Degraded approval rates on WEXD (Node Response 08) 07/05/2024
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Single merchant, Chevron, experienced timeouts for their transaction requests due to an issue with node 2 of load balancer. FIS support team isolated the load balancer traffic to node 1 to mitigate the impact. The affected node was rebooted to resolve the issue.

dv_short_description: Production processing for some clients is impacted due to a storage issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Production processing for a subset of clients was impacted due to a storage issue due to which BMO missed the 23:45 CT SLA for TRIPS Canada Incoming processing, OASIS Performance environment was impacted for UMB Bank and Real Time Payments was impacted for TD Bank. A rebalance was done on the array side and rescan of datastores was done on the ESXi side. Datastores became accessible and VMs were observed back online. Technical teams rebooted all the servers in LRK1 that were experiencing issues to restore the service.
u_alert_to_who: IT went to Matthew Bauer team

dv_short_description: Voice/Telephony Issues - Credit Pay by Phone IVR experiencing intermittent timeouts.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Credit Pay by Phone IVR experienced intermittent timeouts. Clients attempting to get the balance on the Credit Pay by Phone IVR were redirected to agents for processing. Root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: Following the remediation actions no impact on applications behind the Akamai environment was identified.
dv_short_description: Proactive Blocking for Security Issue - No Client Impact Expected
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There was a widespread probing and scanning event which affected Akamai traffic. At 14:35 CT on 17-Jul-2024 the Akamai and Security teams to action to block the activity across the entire enterprise. The incident is on hold until 06:30 CT 18-Jul-2024 , to ensure there is stability.

dv_short_description: IST/Intuit Prod East DBM Error (Impacting Transactions)
u_summary_impact_root_summary: VLINUSEPISTSDB02 Experienced problems and when Azure attempted to migrate the VM it ran into problems (unknown), team failed over into West region to avoid impact

dv_short_description: Master ticket for all the   New York post conversion issue
u_summary_impact_root_summary: This ticket was used to address NY EBT post conversion issues and ECRs to resolve any issues.
u_alert_to_who: Incident was used to address NY EBT post conversion issues that required ECRs to fix.

dv_short_description: Security Issue / Research External Traffic
u_summary_impact_root_summary: This appeared to be a security issue but further research showed there was no threat issue from this activity.

dv_short_description: TellerInsight customers using Positive Pay
u_summary_impact_root_summary:
TellerInsight customers experienced error while cashing checks via Positive Pay, limiting to transactions with only Positive Pay accounts. The call to Positive Pay were failing, but tellers were able to process Cashed check transactions successfully. Issue was caused 
due to a change where the certificate was replaced instead of adding along with the old ones. Another change was implemented to update certificates on the external URL to resolve the issue.

dv_short_description: ACH Tracker
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There is an issue that is affecting ACH Tracker. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: DLM - LR8 - Reports showing Incorrect Name, Location, and Deposit Account.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: A subset of FIS Direct Link Merchant clients' reports were showing incorrect name, location, and deposit account information due to an ImageCentre release. The defect was corrected to resolve the issue. No PIR has been scheduled for this issue.

dv_short_description: IST/SouthEast Region getting Bin Down Alert
u_summary_impact_root_summary: PRC0TS Link went down and continues to bounce, it was brought out of rotation so that no denials will occur

dv_short_description: IBS-Homepage to ImageCentre SSO Not working - Connection Error + Similar report/tickets from Multiple Banks
u_summary_impact_root_summary: IBS Banking Systems users were unable to connect to ImageCentre due to DIH (Digital Integrator Hub) outbound SLAPI (Software Licensing API) channels migration not updating the SLAPI channel name in the database routing configuration name. A problem ticket has been assigned to this incident.

dv_short_description: NETXMS_CHEVRON_EAST_PROD_TPT : [4] : s1 : IST Mbox count reach high water mark
u_summary_impact_root_summary: API formatter process restarted, known issue.  Caused 700+ transactions to error out

dv_short_description: OPF US Wire Transfer / City National Bank of Florida unable to received NCR wires.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: City National Bank of Florida unable to received NCR wires due to fail-over.

dv_short_description: IST Switch - Network disconnection for Chevron and Intuit
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Verizon circuit issue in Little Rock resulted in impact to transactions for Chevron and Intuit on the IST platform. Intuit and Chevron connections were failed over from the East to the West connections to mitigate impact. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: GetPaid North America / Intermittent Issues Getting to the Internet
u_summary_impact_root_summary: North American GetPaid and CashApp clients experienced intermittent connectivity issues.  A secondary proxy server reboot was performed and CashApp recovered at 14:07 CT. FIS will continue to monitor the environment for stability. Root cause is under investigation.

dv_short_description: D1/Multiple Dynatrace alerts
u_summary_impact_root_summary:
D1/Multiple Dynatrace alerts. The impact was minimal. The host or monitoring was unavailable due to connectivity issues. 
The issue was auto-resolved without any technical intervention.  A P ticket will be created to identify the root cause.

dv_short_description: eWire Future dated wires delayed
u_summary_impact_root_summary: EOD File not processed on the 12th, caused issues for Ewire fund transfers

dv_short_description: Debit Card Processing (DCP) - Transactions processing in stand-in due to power outage in Finastra
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Debit card transactions for 80 clients processed in stand-in due to power outage at Finastra. The issue caused unnecessary transaction failures and real-time balances to be displayed incorrectly. Power supply was restored at site, to resolve the issue.
u_alert_to_who: The FIS ProcOps team received an alert that connectivity was lost.

dv_short_description: Power issue at BDOC - No impact reported
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Power issue reported at BDOC. No impact was reported as there was redundancy. A UPS breaker had failed which has been rectified and normal services resumed at 13:43 CT

dv_short_description: Global Protect Issue <connection failed, network connection is unreachable or gateway is unresponsive>
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Unable to connect to Global protect due to which Mobile internet, Jio Fiber and mobile network users were unable to use network services. Issue resolved without any technical intervention from FIS technical resources. Users were advised to switch to an alternate network connection as a workaround. Root cause is under investigation.

u_applications_impacted: Digital One, Mobile, BillPay, CeB and Business eBanking
dv_short_description: Response spike in Digital One, Mobile, ThreatMetrix and Business eBanking
u_summary_impact_root_summary: There was a spike of response times for ThreatMetrix, which was causing impact to Digital One, Mobile, BillPay, CeB and Business eBanking applications. Latency in PHX returned to acceptable levels when the Storage team failed the disk and hence the issue was resolved. Root cause is under investigation.
u_alert_to_who: Applications Teams observed response time spike on D1CIT, BEB, & Mobile TMX calls around 10:45 AM CT.

dv_short_description: we noticed a degraded approval rate on Fuelman with node response 04 started 8:43 AM PDT and still ongoing.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: CHASE had an issue with an issuer causing CVRN cards to fail, once resolved issue stopped

dv_short_description: HORIZON Good Funds - Overdraft fees not applied as expected
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Horizon Good Funds clients' overdraft fees were not being applied as expected. Clients using Good Funds may have observed incorrect data displayed in the AH0015P5 report and may have experienced under-charging of fees. A hot fix was applied under emergency change on 11-Apr-2024 to resolve the issue. Resources are working to target and inform the affected clients of the update and investigate the issue further.

dv_short_description: IST/Chevron and intuit declines due to Verizon circuit issue.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: IST Switch East region was experiencing timeouts due to fiber cut on Verizon's circuit. Traffic was failed over to the West region to mitigate impact. 409 transactions impacted.
u_alert_to_who: Global NOC - - - > IN24013794563/IN24013794565 'Spectrum' triggered event alerting so changed the 'Other' alerting to 'Spectrum'.

dv_short_description: hFIS/ IST/ BINs down for Chevron and INTUIT
u_summary_impact_root_summary:
At 17:08ET to 17:18Et IST Switch saw degraded approval rates for both Chevron and Intuit. RCA under investigation under MS Azure ticket. Early assessment by teams suggest BGP lost connection temporarily and the system detecting a bad health check restarted per standard process, causing latency as the system attempted to recover and a spike of reversals came in from the BGP drop. 

Event cleared in Monitoring console – Support teams to follow up with investigation(s) and confirm no further action is required

dv_short_description: DataNavigator/ Settlement Issue with TransFund clients and FISB switch
u_summary_impact_root_summary: DataNavigator experienced an issue that affected totals processing due to a database indexing issue.
u_alert_to_who: Support team, App built in monitoring tool.

dv_short_description: Datanavigator / Single Client USAA Totals not moving.
u_summary_impact_root_summary: Data Navigator single client USAA experienced delay in fund movement due to a database constraint issue.
u_alert_to_who: The BDOC Mainframe team received an alert for the Fund movement job that not got completed within time.

dv_short_description: P1C1 North America / Some clients seeing authorization declines
u_summary_impact_root_summary: A subset of clients received 05 decline code and 00 response code for transactions in P1C due to a table change made in production.
